author.title: Pritish Samal
author.description: Heyy there, this is Pritish, a Junior year student from NIT Rourkela, India. I'm a Full Stack Developer and a huge Tech & Open-source enthusiast. I believe in communities & love to be involved in community activities.

site.siteDescription: Hey! Myself Pritish Samal, a Junior year student from NIT Rourkela, India. I'm a Full Stack Developer and a huge Cloud & Open-source enthusiast.
site.keywords: Hello! I'm Pritish Samal, a Junior year student from NIT Rourkela, India. I'm a Full Stack Developer and a huge Cloud & Open-source enthusiast.
